'ai'niu'feng'liang'mu 硙牛封两目

'dan'qing'yi'gua'wu 丹青一诖误
'dan'qing'yi'lai'wei'yi'ren 丹青以来唯一人
'dan'qing'zhu'ren'kong'sao'di 但请主人空扫地
'dan'qu'you'ren'shi 但取幽人适
'dan'ran'fang'cun'nei 澹然方寸内
'dan'ran'lin'shui'zuo 澹然临水坐
'dan'ran'wu'suo'yu 澹然无所欲
'dan'ran'wu'ta'nian 澹然无他念
'dan'sha'bu'ken'si 丹砂不肯死
'dan'sha'jian'huo'kong 丹砂见火空
'dan'sha'jian'huo'qu'wu'ji 丹砂见火去无迹
'dan'sha'lian'zuo'san'zhu'tu 丹砂炼作三铢土
'dan'sha'yi'li'bu'ceng'chang 丹砂一粒不曾尝
'dan'sha'yin'zhu'xing 丹砂印著行
'dan'shan'chong'xue'ye'shen'lai 单衫冲雪夜深来
'dan'shang'min'bing'tong 但伤民病痛
'dan'shang'tao'li'lin 但赏桃李林
'dan'shao'jing'bu'cheng 丹烧竟不成
'dan'shi'huan'lai'you 但识欢来由
'dan'shi'ren'jia'you'yi'ai 但是人家有遗爱
'dan'shi'shi'ren'duo'bo'ming 但是诗人多薄命
'dan'shi'wu'can'rou 但食乌残肉
'dan'shi'wu'huang'xin'si'zhu 但使武皇心似烛
'dan'shi'xia'huang'huang 丹实夏煌煌
'dan'shou'guo'qu'bao 但受过去报
'dan'shu'ai'jiu'ri'gao'mian 耽书爱酒日高眠
'dan'shu'li'wei'pi 耽书力未疲
'dan'shui'jiao'qing'lao'shi'zhi 淡水交情老始知
'dan'shuo'xie'e'mei 但说携蛾眉
'dan'si'qin'shi'wei 但思寝食味
'dan'sui'yuan'lu'mo 旦随鹓鹭末
'dan'wei'wang'fu'qing 但未忘父情
'dan'wei'xin'xing'ren'qu'liu 但委心形任去留
'dan'wei'zhi'sheng'si 但未知生死
'dan'wen'chen'ai'neng'qu'fou 但问尘埃能去否
'dan'wen'ci'shen'xiao'de'fou 但问此身销得否
'dan'wen'le'bu'le 但问乐不乐
'dan'wen'qian'tou'xiang'jian'wu 但问前头相见无
'dan'wen'qin'yu'shi 但问寝与食
'dan'wen'shi'yi'wu 但问适意无
'dan'wen'tong'bu'tong 但问同不同
'dan'wen'you'yi'wu 但问有意无
'dan'wen'yun'xin'zi'zai'wu 但问云心自在无
'dan'wen'zhu'ren'liu'ji'ri 但问主人留几日
'dan'xi'chun'jiang'wan 但惜春将晚
'dan'xi'fan'shu'tui 但喜烦暑退
'dan'xi'jia'ru'yun 但喜稼如云
'dan'xi'jin'nian'bao'fan'chi 但喜今年饱饭吃
'dan'xi'qiu'feng'duo 旦夕秋风多
'dan'xi'shu'sui'san'fu'qu 但喜暑随三伏去
'dan'xi'wang'xuan'che 旦夕望轩车
'dan'xi'xia'ri'chang 但惜夏日长
'dan'xi'xiang'zhui'sui 旦夕相追随
'dan'xiao'xie'shou'san'jun'zi 丹霄携手三君子
'dan'xin'lv'jiu'yi'shi'qing 丹心绿酒一时倾
'dan'xin'yan'you'dian 但信言有玷
'dan'xiu'zheng'yao'lu 但休争要路
'dan'yan'jiu'zhe'chi 澹滟九折池
'dan'yan'shu'yu'jian'xie'yang 澹烟疏雨间斜阳
'dan'yao'qian'chen'jian 但要前尘减
'dan'yao'shen'zhi'bu'yao'you 但要深知不要忧
'dan'yao'xiu'xing'gong'yong'shen 但要修行功用深
'dan'yi'en'qing'sheng'xi'xia 但以恩情生隙罅
'dan'yi'shui'zhu'ren 但异睡著人
'dan'you'cun'ming'cun 但有村名存
'dan'you'fu'gui'ming 但有富贵名
'dan'you'ji'quan'sheng 但有鸡犬声
'dan'you'jin'gua'bi 但有巾挂壁
'dan'you'quan'sheng'xi'wo'xin 但有泉声洗我心
'dan'you'shuang'song'dang'qi'xia 但有双松当砌下
'dan'you'xian'xiao'ri 但有闲销日
'dan'you'xin'qing'he'yong'jiao 但有心情何用脚
'dan'yu'guo'shi'shang 但于国史上
'dan'yu'lai'jun'nei 担舁来郡内
'dan'yu'qiu'guang'ju 但与秋光俱
'dan'yu'shi'chen'fu 但与时沉浮
'dan'yu'shi'yu'jiu 但遇诗与酒
'dan'yu'xu'zhong'yan 但馀墟中烟
'dan'yu'yu'zhe'yue 但欲愚者悦
'dan'yu'zhi'cai'bu'yu'di 但与之材不与地
'dan'yuan'jiang'jun'zhong'li'gong 但愿将军重立功
'dan'yuan'kai'long'bian'ru'lin 但愿开笼便入林
'dan'yuan'wo'yu'er 但愿我与尔
'dan'zai'qian'fei'wu 但在前非悟
'dan'zai'xue'qi'xin 但在学其心
'dan'zao'shao'yan'yun 丹灶烧烟煴
'dan'zhao'he'fei'yang 丹旐何飞扬
'dan'zhi'lan'man'zi'qing'kai 但知烂熳恣情开
'dan'zhi'mo'zuo'jiang'xi'yi 但知莫作江西意
'dan'zhi'xiao'sa'shu'chao'shi 但知潇洒疏朝市
'dan'zi'gao'sheng'ge 但自高声歌
'dan'zi'shen'yan'guan 但自深掩关
'dan'zuo'bei'yin'he'liao'li 但作悲吟和嘹唳
'dan'zuo'cheng'zhong'xiang 但作城中想
'dang'bi'lu'ru'shi 当彼戮辱时
'dang'cai'qin'feng'shi 荡蔡擒封豕
'dang'chu'shi'wo'shi'nian'xiong 当初是我十年兄
'dang'chun'bu'huan'le 当春不欢乐
'dang'chun'dui'jiu'yi'yi'huan 当春对酒亦宜欢
'dang'chun'po'chou'ji 当春颇愁寂

'dang'dao'she'hu'li 当道慑狐狸

'de'ru'wu'kuai'huo 得如吾快活

'duo'bei'ren'hu'zuo'san'xian 多被人呼作散仙
'duo'bei'zhong'ren'chi 多被众人嗤
'duo'bing'duo'chou'xin'zi'zhi 多病多愁心自知
'duo'bing'zi'rong'ban'lao'shen 多病姿容半老身
'duo'bu'guo'liu'qi 多不过六七
'duo'bu'guo'san'si 多不过三四
'duo'cai'fei'fu'lu 多才非福禄
'duo'can'shi'chi'chi 多惭侍赤墀
'duo'can'xia'ke'dao 多惭下客叨
'duo'chong'xin'na'guan 夺宠心那惯
'duo'chuan'ci'dai'le'tian'lai 多传此待乐天来
'duo'cui'er'shao'feng 多悴而少丰
'duo'dao'tian'you'you 多道天悠悠
'duo'feng'sha'ai'zi 掇蜂杀爱子
'duo'ji'lei'bu'chi 多即罍不耻
'duo'jian'duo'qiong'duo'ku'xin 多贱多穷多苦辛
'duo'jian'mang'shi'yi'shuai'bing 多见忙时已衰病
'duo'jian'zhu'men'fu'gui'ren 多见朱门富贵人
'duo'jin'bi'yun'yan 夺尽碧云妍
'duo'ku'shi'ming'sai 多苦时命塞
'duo'lao'yu'wo'shen 多老于我身
'duo'pei'huan'yan'chang 多陪欢宴场
'duo'qi'bai'zhang'song 多栖百丈松
'duo'qing'bu'ji'shao'qing'ren 多情不及少情人
'duo'qing'li'ma'ren 多情立马人
'duo'qing'qi'sheng'lang 多情骑省郎
'duo'qing'yu'bie'nan 多情欲别难
'duo'qu'zhong'hou'wang 多取终厚亡
'duo'ru'wu'jie'yu 堕如乌解羽
'duo'sheng'ceng'bei'wai'chen'qin 多生曾被外尘侵
'duo'sheng'zhai'fu'shi'ge'shi 多生债负是歌诗
'duo'shi'qiu'feng'yao'luo'shi 多是秋风摇落时
'duo'shi'tong'zhou'si'ma'shi 多是通州司马诗
'duo'shi'wo'yan'liu 多是我淹留
'duo'si'ni'chang'san'xu'sheng 多似霓裳散序声
'duo'tong'pi'chu'zhu 多同僻处住
'duo'wei'feng'shi'yu 多为奉嗜欲
'duo'wei'jiang'xiang'guan 多为将相官
'duo'wei'ren'suo'hai 多为人所咍
'duo'wei'tu'yuan'bin 多为兔苑宾
'duo'wo'kou'zhong'su 夺我口中粟
'duo'wo'shen'shang'nuan 夺我身上暖
'duo'wo'xi'shang'jiu 夺我席上酒
'duo'wu'shao'nian'wei 多无少年味
'duo'xing'huo'shu'ji 多幸或庶几
'duo'xing'le'tian'jin'shi'bing 多幸乐天今始病
'duo'xing'yu'shi'kang 多幸遇时康
'duo'yan'yi'jing'bu'yi'mang 多言宜静不宜忙
'duo'yi'su'jie'yuan 多疑宿结缘
'duo'yi'xian'dao'shu 多疑仙道书
'duo'yin'bing'hou'tui 多因病后退
'duo'yong'bao'qi'er 多用饱妻儿
'duo'yu'gu'yi'chang'sha'ku 多于贾谊长沙苦
'duo'yu'wang'zhi'fu 多于王质夫
'duo'zai'ge'zhang'fu 咄哉个丈夫
'duo'zai'hua'qing'sui'zhi'zun 多在华清随至尊
'duo'zai'qin'shu'qian 多在琴书前
'duo'zai'yan'fang'zhang'hai'zhong 多在炎方瘴海中
'duo'zai'zhang'da'shi 多在长大时
'duo'zhi'fei'jing'fu 多知非景福
'duo'zhong'geng'bei'chou'qian'yin 多中更被愁牵引
'duo'zhong'li'yu'zao 多种栗与枣
'duo'zhong'shao'zai'jie'you'yi 多种少栽皆有意
'e'cheng'po'sou'xian 俄成皤叟仙
'e'cheng'shi'shui'lin 俄成失水鳞
'e'e'bai'xue'hua 峨峨白雪花
'e'e'kai'xin'ying 峨峨开新茔
'e'e'xia'yun'chu 峨峨夏云初
'e'e'xiang'wei'men 峨峨象魏门
'e'jiao'wei'pu'deng 蛾焦为扑灯
'e'mao'fen'zheng'duo 鹅毛纷正堕
'e'mei'bie'jiu'xin'zhi'fou 蛾眉别久心知否
'e'mei'shan'shi'jie'yun'ni 蛾眉山势接云霓
'e'mei'shan'xia'shao'ren'hang 峨嵋山下少人行
'e'mei'yong'xin'sao 蛾眉用心扫
'e'miao'cheng'li'qi 恶苗承沴气
'e'ru'yang'chu'yi'zai'shui 鹅乳养雏遗在水
'e'xu'yuan'deng'zhu 蛾须远灯烛
'e'zeng'he 鹅赠鹤
'en'ai'she'gu'rou 恩爱舍骨肉
'en'ai'yuan'shi'wang 恩爱元是妄
'en'bao'chan'yan'duo 恩薄谗言多
'en'ci'po'shu'chang 恩赐颇殊常
'en'da'er'cheng'xiao 恩大而惩小
'en'fen'ri'yi'qing 恩分日已轻
'en'guang'wei'bao'da 恩光未报答
'en'jia'zhang'shou'qi'tu'ran 恩加章绶岂徒然
'en'jie'lian'zhi'gan'sheng'ming 恩结连枝感圣明
'en'rong'lian'jiu'zu 恩荣连九族
'en'rong'shang'dian'che 恩容上殿车
'en'shen'que'xia'sui'gao'qing 恩深阙下遂高情
'en'shen'ri'san'gu 恩深日三顾
'en'shen'shi'de'xiang'zhong'zhou 恩深始得向忠州
'en'shen'ze'shang'qing 恩深责尚轻
'en'sui'zi'ni'jiang 恩随紫泥降
'en'xin'huan'kun'mao 恩新换阃旄
'er'ba'zheng'dang'lu 二八正当垆
'er'bai'nian'lai'bian'he'lu 二百年来汴河路
'er'bei'qie'an'zuo 尔辈且安坐
'er'ben'ci'xiang'niao 尔本此乡鸟
'er'bi'fu'guan'zhi 二婢扶盥栉
'er'bian'wu'shi'fei 耳边无是非
'er'bie'ye'niang'fu'bie'qi 儿别爷娘夫别妻
'er'che'yan'yu'xing 輀车俨欲行
'er'chuan'mian'po'qu'ru'qin 耳穿面破驱入秦
'er'ci'chao'shi'xuan 耳辞朝市喧
'er'cong'xin'hui'she'duan'qiao 耳聪心慧舌端巧
'er'dang'fan'zi'si 尔当返自思
'er'di'zhai'zhong'chu'guo'hou 耳底斋钟初过后
'er'du'ai'yuan'shen 尔独哀怨深
'er'duo'hao'shan'shui 而多好山水
'er'fan'shang'qi'sheng 而反伤其生
'er'fan'wen'xiao'jiao 耳烦闻晓角
'er'fei'jiu'de'zhi 尔非久得志
'er'fen'hua'wei'gui 二分化为鬼
'er'gen'de'ting'qin'chu'chang 耳根得听琴初畅
'er'hou'duo'shao'shi 尔后多少时
'er'ji'bu'cai 尔既不材
'er'jia'er'zhang'yu'yu'di 二贾二张与余弟
'er'jian'xin'you'hao 耳间新有毫
'er'jin'er'hou 而今而后
'er'jin'sui'zai'bin'ru'si 而今虽在鬓如丝
'er'jin'xu'bin'jin'po'ran 而今须鬓尽皤然
'er'ku'fei'duo'wo'ku'duo 尔苦非多我苦多
'er'kuang'wo'yu'jun 而况我与君
'er'lai'ji'he'sui 尔来几何岁
'er'lai'san'si'chun 迩来三四春
'er'lai'yi'bai'jiu'shi'zai 尔来一百九十载
'er'lai'yun'yu'kui 迩来云雨睽
'er'leng'bu'ceng'wen'ci'qu 耳冷不曾闻此曲
'er'leng'bu'wen'hu'ma'sheng 耳冷不闻胡马声
'er'li'pin'wen'gu'ren'si 耳里频闻故人死
'er'li'ru'wen'ji'dong'sheng 耳里如闻饥冻声
'er'li'sheng'wen'xin'jiang'xiang 耳里声闻新将相
'er'ling'fen'tu'ru 而令粪土辱
'er'mao'kong'man'tou 二毛空满头
'er'mao'sheng'jing'ri 二毛生镜日
'er'mao'xiao'luo'shu'tou'lan 二毛晓落梳头懒
'er'mu'fu'zhong'si 耳目付中司
'er'mu'jian'cong'ming 耳目减聪明
'er'mu'long'an'hou 耳目聋暗后
'er'mu'zan'qing'kuang 耳目暂清旷
'er'nao'jiu'zeng'wen'su'shi 耳闹久憎闻俗事
'er'nian'chou'wo'zai'chang'sha 二年愁卧在长沙
'er'nian'fang'de'dao 二年方得到
'er'nian'hua'xia'wei'xian'ban 二年花下为闲伴
'er'nian'huan'xiao'yi 二年欢笑意
'er'nian'lu'li'qi 二年戮李锜
'er'nian'pin'yu'shi 二年贫御史
'er'nian'shi'qi'ba 儿年十七八
'er'nian'ta'bian'kuang'lu'jian 二年蹋遍匡庐间
'er'nian'wang'que'wen'jia'shi 二年忘却问家事
'er'nian'zhang'zhi'ye 二年长枝叶
'er'nian'zhi'lun'ge 二年直纶阁
'er'nv'wei'cheng'ren 儿女未成人
'er'peng'li'yi'hu 儿烹鲤一呼
'er'ping'yi'zai'dong'xi'qiang 二屏倚在东西墙
'er'qian'li'bie'xie'jiao'you 二千里别谢交游
'er'qian'li'wai'gu'ren'xin 二千里外故人心
'er'qian'shi'lu'gan'yan'pin 二千石禄敢言贫
'er'qu'bu'hui 尔去不回
'er'ren'du'bu'ran 而人独不然
'er'ren'ru'he'ren 二人如何人
'er'ren'xiang'gu'yan 二人相顾言
'er'ren'zui'dao'neng'hu'xuan 二人最道能胡旋
'er'ren'zuo'shou'zhi 而人坐收之
'er'ri'li'chun'ren'qi'ri 二日立春人七日
'er'san'yue'li'rao'chun'shui 二三月里饶春睡
'er'san'yue'shi'he'cao'lv 二三月时何草绿
'er'shi'fang'zhang'cheng 二十方长成
'er'shi'gou'luan'li 二世遘乱离
'er'shi'ju'xiu'cai 二十举秀才
'er'shi'nian'lai'shi'guan'lu 二十年来食官禄
'er'shi'nian'qian'bie 二十年前别
'er'shi'nian'qian'jiu'shi'juan 二十年前旧诗卷

'er'shi'qi'nian'en 二十七年恩
'er'shi'san'nian'zhe'tai'duo 二十三年折太多
'er'shi'shen'chu'jia 二十身出家
'er'shi'wu'xian'bu'ru'wu 二十五弦不如五
'er'shi'xi'feng'jue 二十袭封爵
'er'shi'yi'qian'chi 二十已前痴
'er'shi'you'jiu'ji'di'wei 二十有九即帝位
'er'shi'you'si'gong'ye'cheng 二十有四功业成
'er'shi'zui'guan'shen 二事最关身
'er'shu'du'neng'xing 二疏独能行
'er'shu'fan'gu'li 二疏返故里
'er'shu'guan'zhi'bei 二疏官秩卑
'er'shun'yin 耳顺吟
'er'sou'bin'fa'ban 二叟鬓发斑
'er'sou'zi'xiang'ying 二叟自相迎
'er'sui'huang'ge'lao 尔随黄閤老
'er'sui'si'xu'yu 二岁似须臾
'er'sun'xiang'hou'zhuan 儿孙向后传
'er'sun'yu'wo'fu'yi'jin 儿孙与我拂衣巾
'er'ti'fu'ku'bu'wen'sheng 儿啼妇哭不闻声
'er'ting'wu'xian'xin'wei'mei 尔听五弦信为美
'er'wang'hou 二王后
'er'wei'hai'you'yu 而为害有馀
'er'wei'shuai'ji'qian 二为衰疾牵
'er'wei'wu'di'zi 尔为吾弟子
'er'wo'chang'yan'qi 而我常晏起
'er'wo'dang'shi'shi 而我当是时
'er'wo'du'he'xing 而我独何幸
'er'wo'du'ku'gao 而我独枯槁
'er'wo'du'wei'xiao 而我独微笑
'er'wo'fang'du'chu 而我方独处
'er'wo'fu'he'jie 而我复何嗟
'er'wo'he'suo'le 而我何所乐
'er'wo'zui'wo'fang'tao'ran 而我醉卧方陶然
'er'wu'fu'gui'shi 而无富贵实
'er'wu'jie'tan'sheng 而无嗟叹声
'er'wu'ke'kou'guan 而无客叩关
'er'wu'qi'qi'yan 而无戚戚颜
'er'wu'xian'cang'hai 尔无羡沧海
'er'wu'yi'chang'ren'wang'wu 尔勿以常人望吾
'er'wu'zheng'xi'he 二物正訢合
'er'wu'zhi'yi'ji 而无职役羁
'er'xing'wen'bi'liu 耳醒闻碧流
'er'xun'si'bai'li 二旬四百里
'er'yang'yang'wei'ji'zhi'wai 尔怏怏为几之外
'er'yi'jin'nian'ci'fu'zhang 尔亦今年赐服章
'er'yi'ting'ru'er 尔宜听入耳
'er'you'wo'ji'mo 而忧我寂寞
'er'yuan'shen'qiang'jian 二愿身强健

'er'yue'yin'he'geng'you'bing 二月因何更有冰

'er'zhi'yan'ran 尔之言然
'er'zhi'zi'hao'bu'yi'zhi 尔知紫毫不易致

'fa'bai'gou'xia 发白狗峡
'fa'ci'kan'chou'jue 发词堪愁绝
'fa'hua'ge'chai'zhui 发滑歌钗坠
'fa'jiu'dan'qing'jiang 法酒淡清浆
'fa'ju'yu'xin'wang 法句与心王
'fa'lun'yi'xiang'luo'zhong'lai 法轮移向洛中来
'fa'qian'shuang'cheng'geng'qu'lai 发遣双成更取来
'fa'qu'fa'qu'ge'da'ding 法曲法曲歌大定
'fa'qu'fa'qu'ge'tang'tang 法曲法曲歌堂堂
'fa'qu'fa'qu'he'yi'ge 法曲法曲合夷歌
'fa'qu'fa'qu'wu'ni'chang 法曲法曲舞霓裳
'fa'qu'mei'lie'sheng 法曲美列圣
'fa'shang'zhou 发商州
'fa'shao'bu'sheng'shu 发少不胜梳
'fa'shao'tou'qing'liang 发少头清凉
'fa'shao'xian'jin'zhong 发少嫌巾重
'fa'shi'zhi'xu'sha'ou'song 发时止许沙鸥送
'fa'shuai'ci'tou 发衰辞头
'fa'wei'yin'yuan'li 法为因缘立
'fa'wei'zhong'ye'yin 发为中夜吟
'fa'wo'guai'lai'chi 罚我怪来迟
'fa'xiang'shi'bian'de 法向师边得
'fa'xin'shao'tan'nan'shan'zhong 伐薪烧炭南山中

'fa'yu'ge'yong'xing'yu'shi 发于歌咏形于诗
'fa'zai'ji'ming'qian 发在鸡鸣前
'fa'zhi'wei'dong'liang 伐之为栋梁
'fan'bai'man'chuan'shuang 帆白满船霜
'fan'bei'ru'bu'quan 翻悲汝不全
'fan'bu'jing'shi'er 梵部经十二
'fan'bu'ri'wei'zu 反哺日未足
'fan'chun'chi 泛春池
'fan'ci'huo'zi'an 反此或自安
'fan'ci'shi'wu'zai 凡此十五载
'fan'ci'shi'yu'nv 凡此士与女
'fan'cu'can'yi'bao 饭粗餐亦饱
'fan'dao'ru'qin'ying 饭稻茹芹英
'fan'fu'kan'wei'yi 反覆看未已
'fan'fu'shu'wei'yi 反复殊未已
'fan'fu'xiang'chi'si'shi'xiu 反覆相持死始休
'fan'fu'xiang'lu'yan 泛拂香炉烟
'fan'ge'mu'deng'shi 梵阁暮登时
'fan'hun'xiang'jiang'fu'ren'hun 反魂香降夫人魂
'fan'ji'xian'yi'bei 樊姬献一杯
'fan'jiang'chang'zuo'bu'xu'ci 翻将唱作步虚词
'fan'jie'cun'bu'ge 翻嗟寸步隔
'fan'jin'yu'zhi'nian 烦襟与滞念
'fan'jun'dui'bei'jiu 烦君对杯酒
'fan'jun'wen'sheng'ji 烦君问生计
'fan'jun'wen'wo'yi'he'ru 烦君问我意何如
'fan'jun'xiang'wo'kan'xin'zuo 烦君想我看心坐
'fan'jun'yu'zhi'fen'ming'yu 烦君玉指分明语
'fan'jun'zan'yong'xin'zhi'kui 烦君赞咏心知愧
'fan'kai'bu'shao'liu 帆开不少留
'fan'kai'qing'cao'hu'zhong'qu 帆开青草湖中去
'fan'lang'xue'bu'jin 翻浪雪不尽
'fan'li'pian'zhou'wei'yao'zhui 范蠡扁舟未要追
'fan'li'wu'wei'jin'cheng'tu 樊李吴韦尽成土
'fan'li'you'pian'zhou 范蠡有扁舟
'fan'li'zhou'zhong'wu'zi'di 范蠡舟中无子弟
'fan'lv'jian'xiao'xu'bai'chang 烦虑渐消虚白长
'fan'lv'yan'shu'xin 繁绿岩树新
'fan'nao'rong'hua'you'yi'guo 烦闹荣华犹易过
'fan'nao'wu'tou'tuo 烦恼污头陀
'fan'pen'shui 泛湓水
'fan'pi'chuan'xi'du'sheng'qiao 泛皮船兮渡绳桥
'fan'qi'guan'shu'yi 饭讫盥漱已
'fan'ran'du'you'miao'ran'zuo 泛然独游邈然坐
'fan'ran'er'bu'you 泛然而不有
'fan're'wei'jing'xiao 烦热委静销
'fan're'yu'xian'xiang 饭热鱼鲜香
'fan'ren'gui'da'ri 凡人贵达日
'fan'ren'nian'san'shi 凡人年三十
'fan'ru'bu'xi'zhou 泛如不系舟
'fan'shen'luo'xiao'han 翻身落霄汉
'fan'sheng'zhu'wa'gou 繁声注瓦沟

'ruo'bi'xian'sheng'shi'su'ren 若比先生是俗人
'ruo'bing'ru'jin'shi'quan'huo 若并如今是全活
'ruo'bu'bing'chi'seng'xing'ku 若不秉持僧行苦
'ruo'bu'fang'wo'lai 若不访我来
'ruo'bu'jie'jia'chan 若不结跏禅
